title: Epitaph for Saboukis Kallimorphos
support: Marble plaque, set in plaster in modern times.

handNote.lettering: Letters with serifs, rhomboid Ο and Φ, angular cursive Ω at l. 5 (as a flipped Μ); ος at l. 2, τη at l. 3, ος and ρων at l. 5 in ligature. Triangle-shaped interpuncts at ll. 3, 4, 5, 6.

provenanceFound._: Ferrara states 'found at Catania', but this remains uncertain

provenanceObserved._: Observed by Torremuzza and Kaibel in Museo Biscari, later by Korhonen in magazzino del Cortile, Collezione Biscari, formerly sala VI, 97.

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

location.address: Castello Ursino, Piazza Federico II di Svevia, 95121 Catania (CT)
